    protected function invalidate()
    {
        $this->statusFlags = 0;	// 0b0000;
    }

    /**
     * Waits for a new message from the server generated by one of the active
     * subscriptions and returns it when available.
     *
     * @return array
     */
||||||||||||||||HAS_DOC_COMMENTNO_RETURN_TYPE
(
    (AST_ASSIGN
        (AST_PROP
            (AST_VAR))
        (SCALAR)))||||||||
